channel.title: Gevent on 我的Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gevent on 我的Blog

item.title: gevent安装
item.description: gevent的安装过程： 1. 安装greenlet依赖 sudo pip install greenlet 2. 安装gevent sudo pip install gevent 安装过程中，碰到下面错误： gevent/gevent.core.c:9:22: fatal error: pyconfig.h: No such file or directory #include "pyconfig.h" ^ compilation terminated. error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1 ---------------------------------------- Cleaning up... Command /usr/bin/python -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip_build_root/gevent/setup.py';exec(compile(getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__).read().replace('\r\n', '\n'), __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-11RdgV-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip_build_root/gevent Storing debug log for failure in /root/.
